post.author: 이성기
post.content:
If you are using VAJ, you can do tracking with breakpoint at the line of servlet code. Another way is to insert System.out.println("result -> " + username) between lines. There is no special debugging method for servlet because servlet is a java code.
If you want to debug your JSP in VAJ, you can turn on JSP monitor in your Websphere Test Environment dialog box.
Scott Lee
post.title: RE: Servlet Debugging?
